title: “- Here, Eudoxie, take my bear skin... since from now on I will not have the pleasure any more to wear it, I give it to you to make a muff out of it... This way I have at least the satisfaction of seeing it from time to time”
medium: Lithograph in black on white wove paper
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. John H. Wrenn Memorial Collection

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of lithograph in black on white wove paper.
